successful_patterns.action: 1. Click the "Accept Cookies" button to close the cookie consent banner. 2. Locate the "Apply Manually" link (href: https://intel.wd1.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/External/job/India-Bangalore/Senior-Data-Analytics-Engineer_JR0276446/apply/applyManually?source=LinkedIn) and click it to navigate to the manual application form where further data entry and file uploads will occur.

domain_knowledge.skill_selectors: For searchable skill dropdowns, type skill name, wait for suggestions, then click the suggestion. Repeat for each skill individually.
domain_knowledge.file_uploads: ALWAYS verify file upload fields are filled before clicking Submit. Use send_keys() and check if value attribute is set.
domain_knowledge.multi_select: For multi-select fields with search, add items one by one: type, wait, select, repeat.
